sentences.en: A busy night in the restaurant can be frantic in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 餐馆晚上生意好，厨房里可能会忙成一片。

sentences.en: A new restaurant has just opened across the road.
sentences.cn: 马路对面刚开了一家新饭馆。

sentences.en: Arnold Schwarzenegger's new restaurant has been slated by a top food critic.
sentences.cn: 阿诺德·施瓦辛格的新餐馆受到了一位顶级食评家的恶评。

sentences.en: Chefs at the St James Court restaurant have cooked for the Queen.
sentences.cn: 圣詹姆斯皇家饭店的厨师们曾经为女王烹制菜肴。

sentences.en: Do book ahead as the restaurant is very popular.
sentences.cn: 该饭店非常受欢迎，请务必提前预订。

sentences.en: He approached me to create and design the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他请我建造并设计该饭店。

sentences.en: He desperately needed cash to bail out the ailing restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他急需现金使经营惨淡的餐馆走出困境。

sentences.en: He insisted we stop at a small restaurant just outside of Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 他坚持让我们在亚特兰大市外不远的一家小餐馆歇歇脚。

sentences.en: He took her out for a five-course dinner in a fancy restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他带她到一家豪华餐厅吃了一顿有五道菜的晚餐。

sentences.en: I hear he frequents the Cajun restaurant in Hampstead.
sentences.cn: 我听说他经常光顾汉普斯特德的卡津餐厅。

sentences.en: I know a wonderful restaurant where we can have lunch next week.
sentences.cn: 我知道一家很不错的餐厅，下周我们可以去那里吃午饭。

sentences.en: James works as assistant chef at a fast food restaurant.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯在一家快餐店当助理厨师。

sentences.en: Motel owners and restaurant managers copped it for neglecting their clients.
sentences.cn: 汽车旅馆老板和饭店经理因为冷落顾客而受到责骂。

sentences.en: Taking my son Peter to a restaurant was a nightmare.
sentences.cn: 带我儿子彼得外出吃饭简直糟糕透了。

sentences.en: The company runs a chain of restaurants.
There is an inviting restaurant with an outdoor terrace.
sentences.cn: 有一家诱人的带露天阳台的饭馆。

sentences.en: We ate in the restaurant, as opposed to the bistro.
sentences.cn: 我们是在餐厅吃的饭，而不是在小饭馆。

sentences.en: We had lunch the other day at our favorite restaurant.
sentences.cn: 前两天我们在最喜欢的餐馆吃了午饭。

phrases.tran_cn: 中国餐馆综合症（据认为是由中国食物中的味精所引起的头痛、呕吐等症状）
快餐店，速食店；快餐餐厅

trans.tran_en: a place where you can buy and eat a meal
a place where you can buy and eat a meal
